com.javagameengine.graphics.mesh

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.graphics.mesh.Mesh

  • public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the information describing a mesh and provides methods for manipulating the mesh or specifying openGL rendering parameters.
    Author:
    ClairaLyrae

        The size of points

      • setPointSize

        public void setPointSize(float pointSize)
        Set the size of points for point meshes. Point size is specified in pixels.
        Parameters:
        pointSize - The size of points

      • getLineWidth

        public float getLineWidth()
        Returns:
        The width of lines

      • setLineWidth

        public void setLineWidth(float lineWidth)
        Set the width of lines for line meshes. Line width is specified in pixels.
        Parameters:
        lineWidth - The width of lines

      • calculateNumElements

        private int calculateNumElements(int bufferSize)
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - Size of vertex buffer
        Returns:
        The number of elements of type mode in this mesh

      • updateCounts

        public void updateCounts()
        Update the vertex and triangle counts for this mesh based on the current data. This method should be called after the capacities of the mesh's buffers has been altered.

      • getElementCount

        public int getElementCount()
        Returns:
        Number of elements on the mesh of type mode

      • getVertexCount

        public int getVertexCount()
        Returns:
        Number of vertices on the mesh

      • setBuffer

        public void setBuffer(VertexBuffer vb)
        Sets the buffer on this mesh to the buffer given.
        Parameters:
        vb - The buffer to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the buffer type is already set

        public void setBuffer(VertexBuffer.Type type,

             java.nio.Buffer data)
        Sets the buffer of the given type to the given data, or creates a new buffer with the given parameters and data.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the buffer to set
        format - The format of the given buffer data
        data - The data to set the buffer to
